summary: A scientist becomes murderous after discovering, and being exposed to the radiation of, a powerful new element called Radium X.
cast: Boris Karloff|Bela Lugosi|Frances Drake|Frank Lawton|Violet Kemble Cooper|Walter Kingsford|Beulah Bondi|Frank Reicher|Paul Weigel|Georges Renavent|Ernie Adams|Ricca Allen|Charles Bastin|May Beatty|Ted Billings|Ernest A. Bouveron|Helen Brown|Daisy Bufford|André Cheron|Alex Chivra|Ann Marie Conte|Edwards Davis|Jean De Briac|Dudley Dickerson|Charles Fallon|Constant Franke|Clarence Gordon|Robert Graves|Winter Hall|Daniel L. Haynes|Isabel La Mal|Alphonse Martell|Francisco Marán|Paul McAllister|Etta McDaniel|Walter Miller|Edward Reinach|Hans Schumm|Ynez Seabury|Adele St. Maur|Lawrence Stewart|Fred 'Snowflake' Toones|Ray Turner|Lucio Villegas|Nydia Westman|Lloyd Whitlock
title: El poder invisible
